                                   Master's Programs                                             The School of Engineering has been at the forefront of teaching the latest technical innovations since its beginning over 150 years ago. Our degree programs and courses are built on fundamentals, but change and evolve to incorporate the latest in technology to ensure that you will lead in your field of study or practice.   Depending on the program you decide to pursue, you can take classes on a full- or part-time basis. We also offer several Executive Master's Degree Programs that take place in "executive format," where students take all required courses together throughout the program. This cohort format helps build teamwork skills and results in developing career-long professional relationships. Students are expected to have substantial business experience prior to applying and to have the support of their companies for participating in the program.
